definition: initiative/to initiate/to propose (a new course of action)

sentences.english: Even high- minded Western initiatives now arouse suspicion.
sentences.chinese: 現在，甚至高尚的西方倡儀都會引起猜疑。

sentences.english: The time seemed ripe for complete fulfilment of the business-sponsored program.
sentences.chinese: 完全實現企業界倡儀的計劃的時機似已成熟。
